34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66 (04:22): heh, how do you scroll to the top in a mobile browser, without invoking the scrollbar
34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66 (04:23): window.scrollTo(0,1) give you an annoying little pixel shift
2360aabaa09d5610935ee7e2283f0780 (04:25): 34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66: hide the overflow while you're doing it
2360aabaa09d5610935ee7e2283f0780 (04:27): 34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66: and detect when you've gotten to the top and then reshow (if you need to do this)
34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66 (04:36): nah that isnt the problem
34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66 (04:37): when you go to a page that doesnt have a scrollbar, window.scrollTo(0,1) doesnt scroll, when you do have a scrollbar, it goes down 1px
34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66 (04:37): http://couch.arandomurl.com/mobilefuton/_design/mobilefuton/index.html#/
34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66 (04:37): it only seems to happen on mobile browsers though, and for some reason I cant just force a scrollbar
34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66 (04:40): I think I just need to be less pedantic
2360aabaa09d5610935ee7e2283f0780 (04:43): 34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66: lol, I thought that URL was fake (arandomurl.com), but then it works
34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66 (04:46): yeh I had a hard time coming up with a domain name
34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66 (04:46): so I just typed arandomurl, and it was there
34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66 (04:52): actually you can see the 1px shift if you look closely
34b0d246331696992e9ee7235f88ca66 (04:52): http://couch.arandomurl.com/mobilefuton/_design/mobilefuton/index.html#/ click on databases, then the icon in the top left
